long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 4631 patch bundle
The attached patch bundle provides several enhancements, most important one's wrt. the web app - see patchsets for a more detailed description or just ask:
changeset: 1330:a8850f7d7017 summary: - new command line option -Z (enable status page)
changeset: 1331:b2c98bfe4263 summary: make index_body.html an include like {header,footer}_include
changeset: 1333:713825d4426c summary: mv eclipse stuff to separate dir, adjust JspC class libs glassfish 3.1.2
changeset: 1334:c6ff1fbcbff0 summary: remove single quotes around configdir value
changeset: 1344:54e0c6162b3f summary: satisfy java 1.6
changeset: 1345:4d1ff765944c summary: merge latest changes from origin
changeset: 1346:b43d9e92554b summary: ignore changes in .settings
changeset: 1347:7dcdf2876dc1 summary: ignore deprecated, add override, deprecated annotations
changeset: 1348:03b848411f89 summary: add option -E to disable xref file compression
changeset: 1349:2c97452fe3b3 summary: Backed out of changeset 1347:7dcdf2876dc1
changeset: 1350:4d69d4686eb5 summary: Merge with 2c97452fe3b3e5ecd2c5a220270349d265e25fbe
changeset: 1351:17cbd57d3156 summary: eclipse cleanup profile
changeset: 1352:dd0dc4a0e294 summary: add index launch config
changeset: 1353:daf3e643037c summary: merge index launcher
changeset: 1354:09e388dc4be9 summary: fix label for
changeset: 1355:e98f333288dc summary: add documentation
changeset: 1356:d1595f28ae3d summary: refactor JS and give more control to the JS client app
changeset: 1357:ed1888336c51 tag: tip summary: web app: reduce the bloat, avoid DOM changes as much as possible
